tool.name: SAGA.statistics_grid.6
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False isArrayPOINTS False output_data_MEAN $output_data_MEAN output_data_DIFMEAN $output_data_DIFMEAN output_data_MIN $output_data_MIN output_data_MAX $output_data_MAX output_data_RANGE $output_data_RANGE output_data_VAR $output_data_VAR output_data_STDDEV $output_data_STDDEV output_data_STDDEVLO $output_data_STDDEVLO output_data_STDDEVHI $output_data_STDDEVHI output_data_DEVMEAN $output_data_DEVMEAN output_data_PERCENT $output_data_PERCENT output_data_POINTS_OUT $output_data_POINTS_OUT name SAGA.statistics_grid.6 GRID $GRID POINTS $POINTS DIRECTION $DIRECTION TOLERANCE $TOLERANCE MAXDISTANCE $MAXDISTANCE DW_WEIGHTING $DW_WEIGHTING DW_IDW_POWER $DW_IDW_POWER DW_IDW_OFFSET $DW_IDW_OFFSET DW_BANDWIDTH $DW_BANDWIDTH prefer $prefer response $response outputType_MEAN $OutputSection_MEAN.outputType_MEAN transmissionMode_MEAN $OutputSection_MEAN.transmissionMode_MEAN outputType_DIFMEAN $OutputSection_DIFMEAN.outputType_DIFMEAN transmissionMode_DIFMEAN $OutputSection_DIFMEAN.transmissionMode_DIFMEAN outputType_MIN $OutputSection_MIN.outputType_MIN transmissionMode_MIN $OutputSection_MIN.transmissionMode_MIN outputType_MAX $OutputSection_MAX.outputType_MAX transmissionMode_MAX $OutputSection_MAX.transmissionMode_MAX outputType_RANGE $OutputSection_RANGE.outputType_RANGE transmissionMode_RANGE $OutputSection_RANGE.transmissionMode_RANGE outputType_VAR $OutputSection_VAR.outputType_VAR transmissionMode_VAR $OutputSection_VAR.transmissionMode_VAR outputType_STDDEV $OutputSection_STDDEV.outputType_STDDEV transmissionMode_STDDEV $OutputSection_STDDEV.transmissionMode_STDDEV outputType_STDDEVLO $OutputSection_STDDEVLO.outputType_STDDEVLO transmissionMode_STDDEVLO $OutputSection_STDDEVLO.transmissionMode_STDDEVLO outputType_STDDEVHI $OutputSection_STDDEVHI.outputType_STDDEVHI transmissionMode_STDDEVHI $OutputSection_STDDEVHI.transmissionMode_STDDEVHI outputType_DEVMEAN $OutputSection_DEVMEAN.outputType_DEVMEAN transmissionMode_DEVMEAN $OutputSection_DEVMEAN.transmissionMode_DEVMEAN outputType_PERCENT $OutputSection_PERCENT.outputType_PERCENT transmissionMode_PERCENT $OutputSection_PERCENT.transmissionMode_PERCENT outputType_POINTS_OUT $OutputSection_POINTS_OUT.outputType_POINTS_OUT transmissionMode_POINTS_OUT $OutputSection_POINTS_OUT.transmissionMode_POINTS_OUT

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: MAXDISTANCE
param.label: Maximum Distance [Cells]
param.help: Maximum distance parameter is ignored if set to zero (default).

param.name: DW_IDW_OFFSET
param.label: Inverse Distance Offset
param.help: Calculates weights for distance plus one, avoiding division by zero for zero distances

param.name: DW_BANDWIDTH
param.label: Gaussian and Exponential Weighting Bandwidth
param.help: Bandwidth specified as number of cells.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_MEAN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MEAN
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DIFMEAN

param.name: outputType_POINTS_OUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculates for each cell statistical properties (arithmetic mean, minimum, maximum, variance, standard deviation) of all cells lying in given direction based on the input grid.
